item.title: 以色列谢克尔上涨，交易商关注伊朗袭击的应对措施
item.description: 以色列货币走强，原因是交易商权衡了全球领导人为避免在伊朗直接发动袭击后爆发更大规模中东战争所做的努力。【原文：Israel’s currency strengthened as traders weighed efforts by global leaders to avert a wider Middle East war following a direct attack by Iran.】

item.title: 当前英国市场的动向
日本最大的电力生产商 Jera 考虑通过 IPO 资助绿色事业
item.description: 日本最大的公用事业公司 Jera Co. 正在考虑首次公开募股，为大规模推广可再生能源提供资金。【原文：Japan’s biggest utility, Jera Co., is considering an initial public offering to help fund a massive rollout of renewables.】

item.title: 陷入困境的韩国建筑商 Taeyoung 将公布改革方案
item.description: 韩国 Taeyoung Engineering & Construction Co.的债权人很快就能了解这家陷入困境的建筑商提出的重组方案的细节。【原文：Creditors of South Korea’s Taeyoung Engineering & Construction Co. will soon be able to learn details of the distressed builder’s restructuring proposal.】

item.title: 美国和欧洲股票期货上涨；伊朗袭击事件对其影响不大
item.description: 美国和欧洲股票期货在亚洲交易时段上涨，市场对中东紧张局势加剧反应平淡。【原文：US and European stock futures gain in Asian trading hours in muted market reaction to heightened Middle East tensions.】

item.title: 利润重燃，英国小型股票迎来赶超时机
item.description: 与蓝筹股相比，英国小型股的前景改善得更快，经济形势的好转将促进利润的增长。【原文：The outlook for Britain’s smaller stocks is improving more quickly than that of their blue-chip peers, with a brighter economic backdrop set to boost profits.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利聘用黄志明推动中国资产管理发展
item.description: 摩根士丹利聘请前瑞士信贷银行家黄敏领导其中国投资管理部门，该美国公司正在重新调整其共同基金业务，并扩大其在世界第二大经济体的产品供应。【原文：Morgan Stanley hired former Credit Suisse banker Min Huang to lead its China investment management division as the US firm recalibrates its mutual fund business and expands its product offerings in the world’s second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 摆脱中东的埃斯库罗斯陷阱
item.description:
市场和世界需要以色列和伊朗打破复仇循环，他们也是如此。蓝图就在希腊悲剧中。【原文：

Markets and the world need Israel and Iran to break the cycle of vengeance — and so do they. The blueprint lies in Greek tragedy. 

】

item.title: 新加坡新房销售创四个月最大增幅
item.description: 在一系列郊区项目的推出刺激了购房热情之后，新加坡的房屋销售量出现了四个月来的最大涨幅，从低迷中反弹。【原文：Singapore home sales rose the most in four months, rebounding from a lull after the launch of a range of suburban projects fueled purchases.】

item.title: BCG 预计收入增长放缓，行业需求减少
item.description: 波士顿咨询公司（Boston Consulting Group）的收入增长速度放缓至三年来的最低水平，原因是咨询行业仍在经受客户需求疲软的考验。【原文：Boston Consulting Group saw revenue growth slow to its lowest level in three years as the consulting sector continues to weather through weaker client demand.】

item.title: 炙手可热的大宗商品市场让各国央行对通胀望而却步
item.description: 新一轮大宗商品热潮正在使央行的反通胀努力变得更加复杂，并可能使大幅降息的前景很快破灭。【原文：A new commodities boom is complicating central bankers’ anti-inflation efforts and may help derail prospects for significant interest-rate cuts any time soon.】

item.title: 听证会获悉，明星主席和前首席执行官密谋推翻监管机构
item.description: 一项调查听说，Star Entertainment Group Ltd. 的董事长和这家陷入困境的悉尼赌场运营商的前首席执行官密谋将政府任命的经理赶下台，即使该公司公开表示合作。该公司股价暴跌。【原文：Star Entertainment Group Ltd.’s chairman and the troubled Sydney casino operator’s former chief executive officer plotted to oust a government-appointed manager even as the company made public statements of cooperation, an inquiry heard. Shares in the company tumbled.】

item.title: 东京电力旗舰核电站将装载福岛事故后的第一批燃料
item.description: 东京电力公司（Tokyo Electric Power Co., Ltd.）将在全球最大的柏崎刈羽核电站装载燃料，这是自 2011 年福岛核泄漏事故后实施限制措施以来的首次装载，日本将继续努力重振其原子能舰队。【原文：Tokyo Electric Power Co. will load fuel at the idled Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear plant, the world’s biggest, for the first time since curbs introduced following the 2011 Fukushima disaster, as Japan continues efforts to revive its atomic fleet.】

item.title: 原油的下一步是什么？伊朗袭击后分析师的看法
item.description: 伊朗对以色列发动的史无前例的袭击几乎没有对石油期货市场造成任何影响，交易商们认为，石油价格的低迷是由于对冲突将继续得到控制的预期所致。以色列正在权衡其对袭击的反应，以下是市场观察人士对前景的看法：【原文：Oil futures were barely moved by Iran’s unprecedented attack on Israel, with traders attributing the lackluster price action to expectations that the conflict would remain contained. As Israel weighs its response to the assault, here’s what market watchers are saying about the outlook:】

item.title: 中国私人建筑商面临 5,530 亿美元的竣工住宅缺口
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）的一份研究报告显示，中国私营开发商在完成预售房屋方面面临着 4 万亿元人民币（合 5,530 亿美元）的资金缺口，这使得这个尚未触底反弹的行业雪上加霜。【原文：Chinese private developers face a 4 trillion yuan ($553 billion) funding gap to complete pre-sold homes, adding to the woes of an industry that has yet to bottom out, according to a research report by Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 林吉特跌至 26 年低点促使马来西亚国家银行承诺提供支持
item.description: 马来西亚央行重申已准备好支持接近 1998 年以来最低水平的林吉特。【原文：Malaysia’s central bank reaffirmed it’s ready to support the ringgit, which is hovering close to the lowest level since 1998.】

item.title: 中国政府重申监管支持，中国股市上扬
item.description: 中国股市周一上涨，因为中国政府重新提供监管支持，使市场免受亚洲股市大跌的影响。【原文：Chinese stocks gained Monday as renewed regulatory support from Beijing shielded the market from a broader selloff hitting Asia.】

item.title: 丝芙兰请来耐克电子商务高管全面改革中国业务
item.description: 丝芙兰聘用耐克公司亚洲电子商务主管领导其中国业务，这家化妆品零售商正面临着扭转内地业务颓势的挑战。【原文：Sephora tapped Nike Inc.’s Asia e-commerce chief to lead its China operations, as the cosmetics retailer faces the challenge of turning around its ailing mainland business.】

item.title: 万科承诺解决流动性问题，股价随之上涨
item.description: 中国万科集团股份有限公司（China Vanke Co.【原文：China Vanke Co. shares rose the most in more than a month after the state-backed builder said it has made plans to resolve liquidity pressure.】

item.title: 对俄罗斯的新制裁将促使更多金属销往中国
item.description: 美国和英国对俄罗斯金属的制裁将巩固中国作为莫斯科关键商品最后买家的地位，并加强上海作为全球经济关键材料定价地的作用。【原文：US and UK sanctions on Russian metals will cement China as Moscow’s buyer of last resort for key commodities, and enhance Shanghai’s role as a venue to set prices for materials crucial to the global economy.】

item.title: 对俄罗斯新供应的制裁令伦敦金属交易所（LME）不安，金属价格飙升
item.description: 由于美国和英国的新制裁措施禁止交付上周五午夜之后生产的俄罗斯供应品，交易商们纷纷响应，伦敦金属交易所的铝价大幅上涨，创下历史新高。【原文：Aluminum surged by a record on the London Metal Exchange as traders responded to new US and UK sanctions that banned deliveries of Russian supplies produced after midnight on Friday.】

item.title: 阿波罗的亚洲扩张为该地区吸引了 350 亿美元资金
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc：自 2022 年初以来，该公司已从亚洲地区募集了 350 亿美元资金，用于扩大业务。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc.’s revamp of its Asia business is starting to pay off: It’s raised $35 billion from the region since the start of 2022 to bolster expansion.】

item.title: 昂贵 "的印度吸引投资者规避中国风险
item.description:
受访者称，尽管估值较低，但中国股市将表现不佳

。【原文：

Chinese stocks will underperform despite low valuations, survey respondents say

】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 美国寻求尽量减少伊以冲突升级。比特币 "减半 "将震撼加密货币行业。印度发布竞选宣言。您今天需要了解的信息【原文：US seeks to minimize Iran-Israel escalation. Bitcoin ‘halving’ set to rock the crypto industry. India releases election manifesto. Here’s what you need to know today.】

item.title: 尼泊尔亿万富翁靠生产方便面发家，他的目标是到 2026 年将印度业务上市
item.description: 尼泊尔亿万富翁比诺德-乔杜里（Binod Chaudhary）靠销售方便面发家，他正寻求在 2026 年之前将其企业集团乔杜里集团（Chaudhary Group）的印度食品部门上市。【原文：Nepalese billionaire Binod Chaudhary, who made his fortune selling instant noodles, is seeking to list his conglomerate Chaudhary Group’s India food unit by 2026.】

item.title: 大赦国际敦促尼日利亚阻止壳牌出售资产
item.description: 以大赦国际为首的民间社会团体表示，政府应阻止壳牌石油公司出售其在尼日利亚陆上石油业务的提议，以确保人权得到充分保障。【原文：Shell Plc’s proposed sale of its onshore oil business in Nigeria should be blocked by the government to ensure adequate safeguards for human rights, said civil society groups led by Amnesty International.】

item.title: 利率对世界经济的束缚只会缓慢放松
item.description: 全球利率的高潮已经过去，但由于政策制定者对通胀威胁保持警惕，世界经济的喘息机会可能有限。【原文：The high tide for global interest rates has passed, but respite for the world economy may be limited as policymakers stay wary at the threat of inflation.】

item.title: 新加坡汽车初创公司在首次公开募股前寻求超过 15 亿美元的估值
item.description: 东南亚二手车市场 Carro 正在筹集约 1 亿美元资金，为上市做准备，并打赌新资金将巩固其在该地区的领先地位。【原文：Southeast Asia’s used-car marketplace Carro is raising about $100 million as it gears up for a stock-market debut, betting that new funds will cement it as the region’s top player.】

item.title: 伊朗对以色列的打击刺激避险需求后黄金跳涨
item.description: 由于伊朗上周末对以色列的袭击推动了对避险资产的需求，黄金在开盘后不久就上涨了 1.2%。【原文：Gold rose as much as 1.2% shortly after the open as Iran’s attack on Israel over the weekend drove demand for haven assets.】
